timeout.description: Optional timeout in seconds for this specific command

hookMatcher.description: Hook matcher configuration with multiple hooks

matcher.description: String (e.g. Write) to match values related to the hook event, e.g. tool names

description: Configuration file for Claude Code CLI settings

$schema.description: The schema for the settings.json file

apiKeyHelper.description: Custom script path to generate an auth value

cleanupPeriodDays.description: How long to locally retain chat transcripts (in days)

env.description: Environment variables applied to every session

includeCoAuthoredBy.description: Include 'co-authored-by Claude' byline in git commits and pull requests

model.description: Deprecated: use env.ANTHROPIC_MODEL and env.ANTHROPIC_SMALL_FAST_MODEL instead. Either "sonnet", "opus", or a specific Claude model ID (see https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/about-claude/models/overview)

allow.description: List of allowed tool permission rules

deny.description: List of denied tool permission rules

defaultMode.description: Default permission mode for tool execution

additionalDirectories.description: Paths to additional directories Claude can access beyond the working directory

enableAllProjectMcpServers.description: Whether to automatically approve all MCP servers in the project

enabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of allowed MCP servers from .mcp.json

disabledMcpjsonServers.description: List of denied MCP servers from .mcp.json

hooks.description: Hooks configuration for executing commands at specific points in Claude Code's lifecycle

PreToolUse.description: Hooks that run before tool calls

PostToolUse.description: Hooks that run after tool completion

Stop.description: Hooks that run when agents finish responding

SubagentStop.description: Hooks that run when subagents finish responding

learnMode.description: Request the model focuses more on educating and co-creating with the user, rather than just completing tasks

forceLoginMethod.description: Force a specific login method, and skip the login method selection screen
